author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is looking to see how others deal with "Going out of Business" sales so that that there is a disincentive to have a pretend  or protracted GOB sale to make the appearance of being in distress such that low prices or great bargains can be had -- compared to competing businesses that are NOT going out of business”
Any policies, links, documentation would be helpful.
Thank you
Pamela Muse
West Regional Director
